description: The M(proxysql_global_variables) module gets or sets the proxysql global variables.

login_port.description: The port used to connect to ProxySQL admin interface.

config_file.description: Specify a config file from which login_user and login_password are to be read.

login_user.description: The username used to authenticate to ProxySQL admin interface.

login_host.description: The host used to connect to ProxySQL admin interface.

save_to_disk.description: Save mysql host config to sqlite db on disk to persist the configuration.

value.description: Defines a value the variable specified using I(variable) should be set to.

load_to_runtime.description: Dynamically load mysql host config to runtime memory.

login_password.description: The password used to authenticate to ProxySQL admin interface.

variable.description: Defines which variable should be returned, or if I(value) is specified which variable should be updated.
